content: PPCH SD Zi Self-drilling framing screws Pancake-head interior metal framing screw (zinc-plated) for fastening stud to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling Lightning Tip – upgraded to be Hilti’s fastest, most reliable interior framing screws Extra-robust – built specifically to resist head breakage and tip burn, saving you wasted screws Faster drilling speed – sharpened tips help the screws to efficiently pierce metal Better drywall finish – reduced head stand-off makes it easier to create a flush surface without rework Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Applications Fastening metal studs to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) Fastening wire lath to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Pancake head Collated: No Length: 5/8 in Technical Data | Screw head type | Pancake head | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 7 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2297641 - Drywall screw S-DD10-16x5/8 PPCH3 02 - Package Size 7500 pc - 3700860 - S-DD10-16x5/8 PPCH3 ZN 02 - 1/2 PAL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 180000x Drywall screw S-DD10-16x5/8 PPCH3 02 - 3700859 - S-DD10-16x5/8 PPCH3 ZN 02 - PAL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 360000x Drywall screw S-DD10-16x5/8 PPCH3 02
